title: Superfood Organic Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Organic, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Take-out
description: A small cafe that serves mostly raw food with raw cakes and sweets, juices, tea, and coffee. Some smoothies contain whey powder. Vegan options include 2 salads, some drinks and some smoothies. Situated in the tourist area within Germasogia district, since 2014. Confirmed open, Oct 2015.
streetAddress: 79 Vasileos Georgiou A Anko seafront court
